title: Learn the most important interpretations of thinness in a dream from Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Losing weight in a dream is one of the confusing and strange visions, as many people wonder what this dream means and what meanings it brings, as many interpretive scholars differed in interpreting this vision. A girl, a woman, or a man. Losing weight in a dream. A person dreams of himself being thin in a dream in the shape he likes, indicates that the dreamer is overweight in reality and seeks in every way to lose weight, but he always fails, and the vision is an expression of what he believes. It may be a vision Thin skin in a dream is good news for the dreamer about his ability to lose excess weight. The vision may also indicate the suffering that the dreamer is going through at this time due to some crises that cause him a lot of sadness and sorrow. Perhaps the vision indicates that the dreamer is going through the experience and pain of poverty and need. In the current period. Thinness in a dream also indicates the dreamer’s excessive failure to perform religious duties, obedience, and duties such as prayer, fasting, and recitation of the Qur’an, which made him suffer greatly throughout his life. Skin in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin believes that seeing thinness in a dream, or extreme thinness, indicates This indicates that the dreamer will be exposed to many financial or personal crises and difficulties in the coming period. Being thin in a dream also indicates that the dreamer will not succeed in some of his personal matters, such as failing in studies or not succeeding in a love relationship, losing a job, or not achieving the desired dream. In life. Severe weight loss in a dream and the dreamer was sad, and this is evidence that he did not achieve his aspirations and dreams in reality. As for whoever saw in his dream that he lost a lot of weight and was not sick until his body reached this form, then this vision indicates the loss of his dear hopes that He was trying to reach it, and God knows best. But if the dreamer was a merchant and dreamed that he had lost weight, then this vision indicates a loss in his business, and if he was rich he would become poor, but if he was in a dominant position he would lose his position. In general, being thin in a dream means That the dreamer will be robbed or cheated, and God knows best. While whoever sees in his dream that he has lost his extra pounds and rejoices with this word, this is evidence that he has achieved what he aspired to in reality. Search on Google and get the correct interpretations. Losing weight in a dream for a single woman. Seeing exaggerated thinness in a dream for a girl is one of the unwanted dreams that translate into failure in her life, whether it is her failure in studies, her failure in working life, or Her separation from her fiancé, her failure in a romantic relationship, and her falling into many troubles and crises in the coming days, and God knows best. Whereas if the single girl in reality is slightly overweight and sees in a dream that her weight decreases to an appearance that satisfies her and makes her happy, then this vision is A sign of regaining her self-confidence and achieving her ambitions and goals. title: Interpretation of seeing a tambourine in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of Al-Nabulsi's dream of a tambourine in a dream Al-Nabulsi interpreted seeing a tambourine in a dream as evidence of the dreamer's fame in the coming days. And the married woman who dreams that she is holding a tambourine, this dream is evidence that something bad will happen to her in the near future and will happen to her badly, and God knows best. And Al-Nabulsi explained the dream of a man hitting himself on a tambourine This dream shows that he is close to many important and famous figures. On the other hand, the dream may indicate that the dreamer himself will occupy a great position and fame in the environment in which he lives and that all the people around him seek to get close to him and get to know him for his reputation. The man who sees a tambourine in a dream on one of the roads near him, this dream indicates a brother, neighbor, or close friend of his, and the dream may indicate a family member on a long journey and seeing a tambourine. In a dream, it may be a sign of the return of that absent person soon. Seeing Ibn Sirin beating the tambourine Ibn Sirin, who interpreted the vision of the tambourine in a dream, indicates that the owner of the dream is waiting for a short joy, God willing. And the unmarried woman who sees the beating of the tambourine in a dream, this dream is evidence of her close marriage, and the dream may indicate that she occupies a position of her reputation in terms of beauty, high morals and good metal. The meaning of seeing the tambourine playing in a dream Scholars interpreted the vision of the tambourine in a dream as indicating the close marriage of the owner of the dream, but the joy may be accompanied by some problems and sorrows. Seeing the tambourine in a dream is a sign of bad luck and sadness. And whoever sees in a dream that he is holding the tambourine in a dream, it may be a sign of no return. And whoever dreams of beating the tambourine, it is evidence of good skin and joy, and marries a woman through a person who has great appreciation, and is famous for her good reputation and good morals. Seeing the tambourine in a man's dream is a sign of the fame that the owner of the dream occupies, or it may be a sign of the ordeal that will prevail over the dreamer. And seeing the tambourine in a serf's dream is good for the owner of the dream. Interpretation of the sound Tambourine in a dream A young man playing a tambourine in a dream is evidence of news coming from an enemy. And the old man playing the tambourine in a dream is evidence of justice and fame. And hearing the sound of the tambourine in a dream is evidence of activity and joy, especially if the tambourine in the dream is a woman or a maid. Hearing the sound of the tambourine in a dream, and the tambourine was an old man, this indicates status, luck, blessing and good fortune. Hearing the sound of the tambourine from a young man in a dream is evidence of the appearance of an enemy. Therefore, we have provided you with all possible interpretations of seeing the tambourine in a dream. Anyone who has a vision and wants to explain it, we welcome your comments at the end of the article and we will provide you with an answer as soon as possible.

title: What exactly is the interpretation of seeing a supernatural force in a dream?

preview.html: Hadota gives you an interpretation of seeing complete supernatural power in a dream. Superpowers are actions that no one can do, and they exist in some and in a small percentage of people. Therefore, seeing a supernatural power in a complete dream is something that can be referred to in the dreams of many and that is why we have brought it to you, our dear followers. See escape from Earth. With all the right and proper meanings, if you are interested in the interpretation of supernatural sleep, just follow the article. Why dream of supernatural abilities? The interpretation of seeing supernatural abilities in a dream shows the reflection of things that have the ability to control the physical things in one’s life. In addition, dreaming of supernatural abilities Supernatural refers to the dreamer's ability to overcome the difficulties he faces. Seeing supernatural powers in a dream is one of the visions that indicate some changes in the future pioneer's life. Seeing someone with completely supernatural powers in a dream is a sign that the dreamer will face some problems and difficulties that He wants to overcome her. Why dream of supernatural power for lonely people? The sight of a lonely girl demolishing houses and buildings around her shows that she wants to break free from some restrictions. The interpretation of supernatural power in a dream full of an ordinary woman shows her ability to endure difficult affairs and be patient. To see yourself flying above the clouds In a dream it also means that she will achieve many successes. Why dream of moving things from a distance? The interpretation of moving things in a dream completely from a distance indicates that the dreamer will take care of some matters related to people. Also, seeing distant moving objects in a dream means that the dreamer will reach a position He is high and may become a king or a president. Dreaming of moving things a distance is one of the visions that easily and reasonably indicate the fulfillment of desires and goals. Why dream of controlling things? A person who has gained supernatural power in a dream is complete and controls large and bulky things shows that he is an arrogant person. Seeing control over Things in a dream is an indication of the visionary’s control and dominance over people, whether at work or otherwise. Why dream that you have superpower? The interpretation of superpower in a dream indicates that he will be a powerful person with great status and position in society. In addition, seeing this dream It shows the dreamer's ability to control things with caution and stability, as well as his ability to correct them. I dreamed that I rose from the ground. A person who sees himself in a dream completed as if flying off the ground is evidence of the fulfillment of goals and desires. Seeing a flight from the whole ground in a dream is good news and a sign of That everything will change for the better. Also, seeing a complete trip in a dream is a sign that the dreamer will have many benefits and advantages in his life. If you have a dream that you want to interpret, leave it in a comment below and our team will respond to you.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a mouse for a pregnant woman and a mouse playing in the house

preview.html: Seeing a mouse in a dream for a married pregnant woman. Seeing a mouse and a white or black-gray mouse being bitten by a mouse. She dreamed of a dead mouse in the house, according to Ibn Sirin and others. Mice in a dream are among the disturbing dreams that cause a state of anxiety in the dreamer. Mice are animals that bother people in reality, and seeing them is equivalent to sadness. There are many because of the damage and diseases that they cause, and many are already working to prevent them and not to have them in any way in their homes, and today we will learn the interpretation of seeing them in a dream. Interpretation of a mouse in a dream: In a dream, it is an immoral woman, and she is called the cursed blacksmith Jew, or a Jew or a thief in the niqab. An abundant mouse produces food, so whoever sees a mouse playing in his house will increase his food. Because it is only in a place where there is food, and whoever lets the mouse leave his house says his blessing and grace, and whoever has a mouse has a servant because the mouse eats what the man eats, and the servant also eats. . The master is eating - and whoever sees a mouse playing in his house, he will be fertile that year, because the game is only from satiety, and the white and black mouse appear day and night. - And whoever sees a mouse digging, then he is a veil thief, so let him be alert. And a mouse is a woman with a bad, rotten bed, and there is no difference between a male. And the female, even if he sees it. [p. 133] If he picks up something from her or gets it, then she is also a woman and the mouse is women as long as their colors are not different. - And whoever sees that he killed a mouse, the bad woman will be victorious. And whoever sees that she shot a mouse with an arrow, stone, or nut, then spoil her or write It has bad messages. And whoever sees that he has collided with a rat, then he will conspire with a woman or have sex with her - and whoever sees a lot of rats, white and black, on a slope or a cliff, or in a well, this is a deficiency in his life. And whoever sees that a rat has come out of His nose or any of his organs, he will have a bad girl with no good in it. - And whoever dreams of seeing a virus in his house, someone with no good in it will bring it in. And whoever sees a mouse in his clothes or on his bed, then it is a woman interfering with him, and there is no good in it. - And whoever sees that he is struck by the skin of a mouse, some Money from an evil woman. Interpretation of mice in a dream by Ibn Sirin. A mouse in a dream is interpreted as a woman inside and her appearance is ugly, and it is not interpreted as a woman if in a dream the color of a mouse is different. There are different interpretations of seeing mice in a dream, such as: seeing death, killing, or catching mice in a dream. This indicates the appearance of a disaster or misfortune, and whoever dreams that he fell on a mouse and killed it, this means parting with an immoral woman. And whoever sees in a dream that he is stoning a mouse, this indicates that he is committing an immoral act with that woman, and whoever sees in a dream that he is shooting an arrow at a mouse, This indicates corresponding with a woman, and whoever sees in a dream that he caught a mousetrap, this indicates that he will marry a woman through trickery. He is cunning, and whoever dreams that his house is full of mice, this indicates that he will be captured by a number of people with the same number of mice. And if these mice in the dream are of the same color, then this is the fortuneteller’s lesson. If the mice are of different colors, this indicates a long life if they are in one place, and

Evidence of the approaching wedding date. Interpretation of seeing eggplant in a dream of a man working in the field of fishing? Evidence of abundant food. What is the interpretation of seeing eggplant in a dream of a married woman? Evidence of kindness. Then seeing fried eggplant indicates the position of the dreamer. Baked eggplant is evidence of problems and difficulties. Then seeing the eggplant market is a sign of kindness to the dreamer. title: Interpretation of a dream about water by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about water: Seeing water in a dream is a common dream and carries within it many interpretations and associations, such as those that express goodness, paint, positive events, good luck, and others that bring with them nothing but sorrows, worries, and difficult times. We will explain all the interpretations related to water in a dream and they will be as follows. Interpretation of a dream about water There are many interpretations and signs related to seeing water in a dream and they are as follows: If a person sees water in his dream, this is clear evidence that he is earning his livelihood from lawful sources after suffering and misery. If The dreamer is still studying and sees water in his dream, this is a clear sign that he is able to remember his lessons in an excellent way, which will lead to gaining a prominent position in the scientific aspect in the near future. If one sees water in his dream and it is impure, this is clear evidence that he is working in a suspicious job. And he earns money from a prohibited source. Interpretation of a dream about running water in a dream for a man symbolizes a change in circumstances from poverty to wealth and the restoration of financial status. If the dreamer dreams that he is drinking water that is free of very clear impurities, then this is a clear indication of the arrival of happy news, omens, joys and positive events in the future. The coming period. A person watching himself bathing in cold water leads to the end of difficult periods and the end of all problems that disrupt his life in the coming period, which positively affects his psychological state. Interpretation of a dream about water by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin explained many of the meanings and associations related to seeing water in a dream. They are as follows: If a person with a serious illness sees water in his dream, this is clear evidence that God will restore him to health, relieve him of pain and enable him to live a normal life in the coming period. If a person sees in his dream turbid water full of impurities and a bad taste, then this Evidence that he has fallen into a major disaster that turns his life upside down, leading to his poor psychological state. The interpretation of a dream about pure, pure water in a person’s vision leads to many positive changes in his life that make it better than it was before. If a person sees himself giving water For thirst until it is satisfied, this is a clear indication that he extends a helping hand to those around him, his morals are generous and he performs many charitable works. Which leads to a higher position in this world and the abode of truth as well. What is the interpretation of seeing water in one dream? Seeing an unmarried woman for water in a dream has many interpretations and meanings, the most important of which are the following: If a single woman sees clean water in her dream, this means A clear indication of her ability to achieve many achievements and successes that she has aspired to reach for a long time. If a girl is engaged and sees salt water in her dream, her engagement will be canceled due to incompatibility between her and her partner, which will lead to sadness and poor psychological state. The Virgo who sees Herself in a dream walking on pure water leads to her good condition, following the Book of God and the Sunnah of the Messenger

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about hunting by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq?  Interpretation of a dream about fishing from a well and interpretation of a dream about fishing with a hook in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about fishing: When a person sees a fish in a dream, he feels great happiness and joy because it indicates food, but this vision has many interpretations and depends on the size and type of the fish, and this we will learn through the article. Interpretation of a dream about fishing by Ibn Sirin. What is the interpretation of a dream about fishing? Interpretation of a dream that he catches a fish? A large fish with a hook is evidence of following a large diet and the dream indicates that his life will be a blessing. Whoever sees that he is catching a fish and the water is clear and clean and not dirty, then the vision indicates the satisfaction of his desires that he has been trying to achieve for a long time, but if the water is dirty then this indicates Anxiety and sadness. Which falls on the responsibility of the dreamer. Fishing in a dream is one of the promising visions that express wealth and goodness and may symbolize children. Catching large fish in a dream differs from catching small fish because the former shows food and goodness, while the latter has no good or benefit because it appears Problems and great efforts made by the mind to achieve its goals, but to no avail. In addition, the small fish contains many thorns, which indicates the difficulties that a person faces in his life or in achieving his desires. Catching a small fish in a dream with a hook is a sign that the dreamer will lose all his possessions. What is the interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s dream about fishing? Ibn Sirin says that the dream of catching fish from the sea, whether with a net or a hook, is evidence of the benefit and goodness that the dreamer obtains, and it may indicate that he obtains an amount of money equal to the amount of fish that he obtains. Catch. The vision shows that the more fish is caught in a dream, the more food he gets and vice versa. Catching from clear water is evidence of your attention to good news, while fishing from a well is evidence of the fortuneteller’s bad morals and the commission of forbidden acts, including prostitution. Seeing a fresh fish in a dream expresses the number of husbands in the dreamer’s life, and it will be the same as the number of fish he obtained in the dream. Fishing with a scale indicates the riches that the dreamer obtains, but he uses deception to obtain them. What is the interpretation of a dream about fishing for Imam Al-Sadiq? Says the Imam Al-Sadiq: Seeing fish in a dream indicates the benefit that the dreamer obtains, as well as the satisfaction of desires. Catching small fish from salt water like the sea is evidence of the fears and problems that he is experiencing. This vision in the dream of an unmarried young man is evidence of an imminent marriage, and may indicate the marriage of the young man. A new job, and the interpretation of this dream in a married woman’s dream is evidence of her kindness and support. And her husband and the stability of her married life. To get the correct interpretation, conduct a search on Google, the Egyptian dream interpretation site. Interpretation of a dream about fishing for single women. Fishing in a dream for an unmarried woman is a sign of survival and kindness, and it also indicates success and excellence in study and obtaining the highest grades. The vision expresses Also about achieving the desires that he sought and doing everything in his power to achieve them. The vision indicates marriage to a man of good morals.

title: The interpretation of seeing a camel in a dream indicates frequent trips

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a camel by Ibn Sirin: See the point of a camel in a dream, long trips, or repeated trips from one place to another. Seeing a camel also indicates the dreamer’s victory in battles. It indicates his victory over his enemies or achieving a goal that is unattainable for him. Seeing him in a dream indicates that the dreamer He has a number of praiseworthy qualities, such as patience, endurance, honesty, and dedication to work. If a person sees in a dream that a camel enters a place smaller than him, this indicates the presence of jinn in that place. If a person sees in a dream that he is falling from the back of a camel, this is a sign that he will be exposed If an unmarried girl sees a camel in her dream, this is a sign that she will soon marry a strong-willed young man who has masculine qualities and dignity. If an unmarried girl sees that a man She does not know him giving her a camel in a dream. This is a sign that she will marry a rich man who will give her a huge dowry, the size of which she saw in her dream. What if he saw a free girl who tamed the camel in her dream and was able to control it, this indicates her marriage to a weak and hesitant man. Seeing an unmarried girl in a dream means She will go through a transitional stage in her life that will gradually change her situation from one state to another that is better. And if the single girl is going through some difficult circumstances in her life. Seeing a camel in a dream indicates the nearness of her relief and the ease of her condition from God Almighty. She declares that she bears responsibility and performs her duties with patience and wisdom. Interpretation of seeing a camel in a dream for a married woman: If you see a married woman in her dream, this means that she is going through some problems and difficulties in her life, especially in the first period of marriage. Seeing a camel in a married woman’s dream means that she is going through some emotional changes between her and her husband, which has made her feel confused and hopeless. The dream of a married woman also indicates the many responsibilities and duties assigned to her, but she can carry them out patiently and tirelessly. Interpretation of slaughtering a camel in a dream: If a man sees in a dream slaughtering a camel, this indicates his serious illness. The more difficult it is to slaughter a camel in a dream, the more serious the illness will be. And if he sees If anyone sees in a dream that he is slaughtering a camel in his house, this is a sign of the death of the owner of that house. Interpretation of a dream about hunting a camel If anyone sees a camel, this is evidence that in his life Someone who is jealous and deserving of him and tries to prevent him from breastfeeding. If he sees a camel chasing him in a dream, this means that the dreamer suffers from anxiety and fear and lacks security in his life. This dream also indicates that the dreamer will face obstacles and obstacles in his life that will prevent him from achieving his goals in life. Life for a long time. Chasing a camel in a dream Dreaming of a camel attacking a fortune teller in a dream indicates that the dreamer is a weak person and lacks self-confidence. The vision may also indicate that he is facing many difficulties in his life. In some cases, the

title: Interpretation of the view of the lake in a dream by Ibn Sirin in detail

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a lake in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. It should be noted that the lake is one of the bodies of water present on the surface of the planet and therefore it is an important part of nature, so dreams are related to searching. For the sake of water or the sea, to obtain an interpretation of seeing the lake in a dream, and therefore its interpretive connotations vary, according to the person who had the vision or the one that follows it in his life, and it is either news sent by the dreamer God. Or a warning and a warning to the dreamer. Interpretation of seeing a lake in a dream by Ibn Sirin. In fact, the interpretation of seeing a lake in a dream indicates goodness and happiness, which arose according to the interpretive connotations provided by interpretation scholars, in addition to it being considered one of the dreams that people want to achieve. Accurate interpretation of: It should be noted that the interpretation of seeing a lake in a dream indicates a delay in the fulfillment of dreams and desires. Thus, seeing the dreamer sitting in front of the banks of a lake indicates the collapse of worries and problems and the arrival of happiness in his life. But if an unmarried girl sees herself sitting in front of the banks of a lake Beautiful, this indicates the arrival of happiness in her life and the achievement of what she wants. On the other hand, a dream of a lake and beautiful landscapes brings with it good news of obtaining many opportunities. But if the lake is dirty, it is one of the dreams that indicates the presence of problems faced by the dreamer. Therefore, the Seeing a lake in a pregnant woman’s dream is a sign of the approaching date of her birth and the birth of a healthy child. On the other hand, the lake in a married woman’s dream gives good news of stability in her married life. Likewise, sitting in the lake is linked to the good news of freedom from worries and problems, God willing. See also: Interpretation of dreams of seeing a sheep In a dream, one of the most famous interpreters is the interpretation of seeing a lake and a pond in a dream. In addition, there are different interpretations related to the interpretation of seeing a lake in a dream, which may be related to the desires that a person seeks to fulfill, and therefore drowning in a lake is considered a bad dream, which indicates poverty and loss: In fact, seeing a lake or pond in a dream is a sign associated with desires, in addition to indicating women who want to have sex. Therefore, seeing a large-sized lake or pond is a sign of meeting people with life experience who provide support and assistance to the visionaries. On the other hand, the small lake is associated with the end of crises and problems, as well as being a sign of transcendence and freedom from distress. Also, seeing the big lake for a bachelor is good news for his imminent marriage and having a huge wedding. But if a man sees the big lake, this is a sign that something big It is happening around or something is being celebrated. On the other hand, seeing a deep blessing is evidence of an abundance of money that goes beyond the status of the person having the vision in society. But seeing a lake in a dream for a married man or woman means that God will bless them with good offspring. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing The muezzin in a dream
